creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Hanging of deep yellow satin brocade with large interlocking medallions in ground. Five five-clawed dragons in gold, the central one in a medallion. Details in lacquer red. Wide border of blue and gold Greek key diaper brocade. Lining of tan cotton. At top and bottom two rigid rods have been inserted in order to weight hanging.
title: Hanging
